snippet: Florian Homm, a former fund manager from Germany who faces extradition to the United States on security fraud, has willfully documented his rise and fall.
abstract: Florian Homm, prominent former hedge fund manager from Germany who faces extradition to the United States on security fraud charges, which he denies, has published an autobiography, given interviews and appeared on German television; in annals of rogue finance, he stands out for compulsion to share his exploits.

byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: Florian Homm, a former fund manager from Germany who faces extradition to the United States on security fraud, has willfully documented his rise and fall.

headline.main: Financier Says He’s Guilty of Everything but a Crime
headline.print_headline: Admitted Rogue Says He’s No Criminal
